thread.title: Labour 'attacking Ukip with lies' in bid to win Stoke by-election | Politics | News | Express.co.uk
thread.title_full: Labour 'attacking Ukip with lies' in bid to win Stoke by-election | Politics | News | Express.co.uk

author: Jack Warren
title: Labour 'attacking Ukip with lies' in bid to win Stoke by-election | Politics | News | Express.co.uk
text:
Labour has got nothing constructive to say about its own policies, all its doing is attacking UKIP with lies Gerard Batten 
He believes consecutive Labour MPs over the years has left voters in the city feeling left behind. 
Speaking to Express.co.uk, he said: “The mood up there among the people is that they have been abandoned. They’ve had a Labour MP for the last 50 years. All they’ve seen is economic decline. 
“If you go up there it’s obviously a place that needs revitalisation and regeneration. So the mood is very bad, but we’ve got an enormous amount of support and I do think the result is going to be very, very close." EXPRESS Ukip's Brexit spokesman believes the Stoke Central by-election will be "close" 
“Every UKIP voter needs to get out on the 23rd because I think that we can win, but It’s going to be a close result and we need more of our support out.” 
He said some activists within Labour had slumped to new lows by trying to run a smear campaign to the detriment of Ukip. 
In one incident, a number of texts were sent to voters in Stoke claiming Muslims would go to hell if they didn’t vote Labour. GETTY Ukip leader Paul Nuttall is campaign to win the seat from Labour 
Allegedly sent by a Labour activist, the divisive message read: “Every Racist is voting for UKIP. UKIP are a Racist Party, who are hate Muslims and Islam.” 
Although Labour has distanced itself from the texts, Mr Batten continued: “Of course the Labour party has got nothing constructive to say about its own policies, all its doing is attacking UKIP with lies. 
“That’s all they’ve got so it shows how bankrupt they actually are of any ideas or genuine motivation. 
“UKIP’s having a great campaign but if you live in Stoke get out and vote UKIP on the 23rd." GETTY The seat has been held by Labour for 50 years Labour MP resignations
